text: ( Source : The Office of the Governor of the State of Oklahoma ) OKLAHOMA CITY - In the wake of Oklahoma 's worst drought in decades, Governor Mary Fallin today praised Oklahoma's Water for 2060 Advisory Council for its diligent work to develop
